New Records: Pakistan chased down a target of 345, bettering the previous successful chase of 328 set by Ireland in the 2011 World Cup
Key Match Events: Mohammad Rizwan scored an undefeated 131 and Abdullah Shafique made 113
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Rizwan: 'Itâ€™s always a proud memory when you perform for your country'
Sri Lanka's captain, Dasun Shanaka: 'We have to look at the areas we bowled and the number of extras. The only way is to encourage [them]'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan stretched its Cricket World Cup record against Sri Lanka to 8-0
Sri Lanka have had plenty of bowling problems at the World Cup, and also lost their opening game against South Africa
Others: England beat Bangladesh by 137 runs in the earlier game
Dawid Malan scored 140 off 107 balls for England
